DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare short-term effectiveness ( 2 6 week follow start rehabilitation program ) , term symptoms functional limitation , rehabilitation program center gradual reloading rehabilitation program center rest cryotherapy individual acute rotator cuff tendinopathy . The secondary objective explore effect program shoulder control ( acromiohumeral distance ) , subacromial structure ( supraspinatus tendon thickness ) central pain modulation . The hypothesis rehabilitation program center gradual reload lead faster improvement week 2 6 compare program center rest cryotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Treatments Acute Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: 44 adult ( age 18 65 ) acute ( < 6 week ) unilateral symptomatic RC tendinopathy recruited.This single-blind ( assessor ) , parallel-group RCT include three evaluation session 6 week ( baseline , week 2 , week 6 ) one meeting treat physiotherapist ( right baseline evaluation ) . All participant take part baseline evaluation . They first complete questionnaire sociodemographic , symptomatology comorbidity , well self-administered questionnaire evaluate symptom functional limitation ( DASH , WORC BPI ) . Then , ultrasonographic ( US ) measurement AHD supraspinatus tendon subacromial bursal thickness conduct . Thereafter , pain inhibitory control assess use condition pain modulation . Finally , corticospinal excitability infraspinatus muscle evaluate . Thereafter , participant randomly assign one two intervention group , take part assign home program . At week 2 6 , self-administered questionnaire re-administered ( phone week 6 evaluation ) . A global rating change question ( % change since baseline ) also complete week 2 6 . US measurement , condition pain modulation corticospinal excitability revaluated week 2 . To evaluate effectiveness blinding , assessor complete question relate his/her opinion allocation week 2 . The study carry Centre interdisciplinaire de recherche en réadaptation et en intégration sociale ( CIRRIS ) two different physiotherapist two different laboratory . Ethics approval obtain Institutional Review Board IRDPQ .
DOC.criteria: Between 18 65 year old Acute ( < 6 week ) unilateral symptomatic rotator cuff tendinopathy Positive sign follow category : ) painful arc movement , b ) positive Neer KennedyHawkins test , c ) pain resist isometric lateral rotation abduction , positive Jobe test . Fracture symptomatic upper limb ; Previous neck shoulder surgery ; Shoulder pain reproduce active neck movement ; Shoulder capsulitis ; Clinical sign full thickness rotator cuff tear ; Rheumatoid , inflammatory , neurological disease ; Behavioural cognitive problem .
